name: HiBob
description: Integrate with HiBob to list, get, search and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Employees
tools.description: List employees from HiBob. Returns names, emails, departments, and work information.

tools.name: Get Employee
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific HiBob employee by their ID or email.

tools.name: Search Employees
tools.description: Search for employees in HiBob using field filters. Supports searching by name, department, title, and custom fields.

tools.name: List Time Off
tools.description: List time-off requests from HiBob. Filter by employee, date range, or status.

tools.name: Get Company Info
tools.description: Get company information from HiBob. Returns company name, sites, departments, and other organizational data.
